attributes.comment:
My name is Kristin Rice and I am an adoptive parent. I would like to voice my
opposition to the increase in fees for the 1600A. My husband and I are in the
process of adopting a second child. With the increased wait times for adopting
children from China, it is very likely that we would have to incur the fee for the
1600A twice. Like other adoptive families, we are already scrounging and saving to
bring home our child; this 140% increase would have a large impact on our family
and will be even more devastating if the full price has to be incurred more than
once.

Adoptive parents are honest Americans who are just trying to do the right thing for
their families and for a needy child in another country. I understand the US
Government's need to increase fees for this growing area of federal services, but
the adoption process is difficult and expensive as is, and there is no need for the
adoption community to be subject to this increase. By keeping the fees the same
you will be doing a great service to this group of Americans.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Kristen Rice
